forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. South wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn lightly brushes the horizon, Downtown San Francisco stirs quietly under a mostly clear sky, suggesting a pleasant day ahead. The temperature dips around forty-six degrees, an invitation to wrap oneself in a light sweater or jacket—enveloping warmth for the morning chill while remaining comfortable as the sun ascends. The gentle south winds, barely stirring at two miles per hour, carry a hint of the sea, mingling soft scents of salt and adventure.

As sunlight bathes the city, expect a cheerful embrace of warmth, climbing to the low sixties. The allure of the day beckons to those looking for simple pleasures; a stroll along the Embarcadero could evoke a sense of serenity as you watch the boats glide on shimmering waters. Alternatively, finding a cozy café to sip on a warm beverage while observing the world can transform an ordinary Sunday into a cherished moment. There’s an added charm to the way the city appears unclouded; although a faint marine layer spills off the shores, it does not intrude upon the beauty unfolding—a perfect day for casual exploration and quiet reflection.
